Name: Japanese Puzzle
About the game: Japanese Puzzle is a puzzle-puzzle game made in 2D graphics, where you have to collect puzzles with anime girls. The game contains: - puzzles with different girls drawn in anime style. - 30 levels. - funny musical accompaniment. - Convenient puzzle collection system, - light motives of Japanese culture. Develop your brains, admire the girls and just relax and enjoy the process.
